member_organisations: We are in the process of recruiting membership and building our networks.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Internal Market and business legislation relating to the environment and to industry, Media and Audiovisual legislation, export trade and commerce, free movement of goods, justice home affairs and human rights. 
 
In particular the Society has campaigned over its first 12 months of existence to promote awareness of the investment opportunities in Romania with a view to encouraging direct inward investment into the country.
organisation_name: European Union Romania Business Society AISBL (EUROBUS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: The Society is newly formed, and will in the first instance be submitting views on new legislative proposals from the European Commission on Media and the Audiovisual sector.
goals__remit: The primary goal of EUROBUS is to promote the opportunities for business and commerce between hte EU and Romania, to promote information about the investment climate in Romania, to promote good governance in Romania and all of the countries of the Danube Region  and to publish and distribute information, organise marketing and lobbying to promote the objectives of the Society.
